en: Hey, #NAME. I was thinking about it yesterday, and... I'm sorry.
You've been trying to give this your all. I think that's amazing! If I'm anywhere close to being a good enough friend of yours, I should support you - not get all selfish and take up your time.
I'm sorry I've been distracting you. I can wait a while. You go get your dream. I'll be here when you come back.
Of course, #NAME. I got your back!
